mapper.select: select uo.*,sci.company_name, sdi.depart_name from user_opinion uo LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON uo.user_id=ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON ssi.comp_id=sci.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id where uo.deleted = 1 and uo.id = #{id}
